org.seedstack.business.specification

Class StringSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.business.specification.StringSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Specification<String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringEqualSpecification, StringMatchingSpecification

    public abstract class StringSpecification
extends Object
implements Specification<String>
    Base class for specifications that compare strings. Allows to specify string-related comparison options like trimming or case sensitivity.

      Options used for comparing strings.
